inclusion.criterion: positive C. difficile test within the 10 days prior to the procedure
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday

inclusion.criterion: patients must have failed at least two courses of appropriate antibiotic therapy for C. diff to be a candidate for this procedure
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: negative C. difficile test within the 10 days prior to the procedure
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday

exclusion.criterion: less than two courses of appropriate antibiotic therapy for C. difficile infection
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has symptoms consistent with c-difficile infection, but lab study is not provided to confirm the number of courses of antibiotic therapy failed.
